title: High On Love Hey Penne En Nenjil Lyrics English Meaning
stanzas:
Lyrics in Thanglish
hey penne
en nenjil
saaindhu saaikkirai!

nee arugil
puriyatha
maayam seigiraai!

unnai polavey
naan inge.
mayangi kirangithaan
ponenney!

bodhaiyaaga thaan
aaneney!
thalladum jeevaney

jannal oramaai
munnale ye
minnal polavey
vandhaaye

vinnai thaandi
or sorgaththai
mannil engumey
thanthaaye

vizhiyai neengi
nee vilagaathe!
nodiyum yen manam
thaangathe
yenna nerumo
theriyaadhe!
yen jeevan yenguthe!

yen uyirinai vadhaithidum
azhagi nee
yen idhayathil amarndhidum
arasi nee
yen udalinil nadhiyaai odum
udhiram neeyadi

un sirippinil
kavidhaigal kalanguthe!
un mozhigalil
isaigalum thorkuthe!
un iru vizhi minal yaendha
vaanam yenguthe!

unakkul yendhan
kaadhal kaangiren!
veliyil solla
vaarthaigal thevai ah?

irundhum un idhazhgal
andha vaarthayai solluma?

kuruvi polave
yen ullam
thaththi thaavudhe
unaale!

kuzhandhai polave
yen kaalgal
suththi thiriyudhe
pinnale!

theeyai polavey
yen dhegam
paththi yeriyuthey
thannale!

aruvi polavey
aanandham
nillamal paayudhe…

hey penne
en nenjil
saaindhu saaikkirai!

nee arugil
puriyatha
maayam seigiraai!

English Translation
Hey lady
you’re sliding
on me..

You’re doing
magic
around me

Like you,
I am going dizzy
and giddy
Here

became addictive
my life is
teetering

Like a lightening
In the sky
you just came
before me

Like a heaven
beyond the sky
You gave me
everywhere.

don't go away
from my eyes,
i can’t take it
for even a minute.
don’t know what will
Happen but
my soul is longing..

you’re a beauty
killing me violently.
you’re a queen
sitting in my heart.
you’re the blood
running in my veins.

your smile disturbs
the poetic sense
your accent defeats
the music notes.
sky is longing to hold
your eyes lightening

I’m seeing my
love in you.
Do you still want
to express with words ?

yet your lips
will say those words ?

like a Sparrow
my mind is
jumping coz
Of you!!

like a baby
circling around
my legs are
circling you.

my body
is burning
In fire
on its own

like a waterfall,
my happiness
is flowing infinitely.

Hey lady
you’re sliding
on me..

You’re doing
magic
around me
